title: Seven
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR30L
description: Students will become familiar with the high-frequency word seven in this repetitive story. The text provides information about the number seven through detailed, colorful illustrations and simple text. Students will enjoy searching the illustrations for the 7 hidden in each picture. Use this book to teach students about finding details to support the main idea and using periods.
highFrequencyWords: Guided Reading Lesson PDF
comprehension: Ask and answer questions to understand text
awareness: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /L/ sound
